48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Hudhaifah bin Al-Yaman [may Allah be pleased with him] narrated that when the Prophet (ﷺ) wanted to sleep, he would say:“O Allah, in Your Name I die and I live (Allāhumma bismika amūtu wa aḥyā).” And when he would wake, he would say: “Allah praise is due to Allah who revived my soul after causing its death and to Him is the resurrection (Al-ḥamdulillāh, alladhī aḥyā nafsī ba`da mā amātahā wa ilaihin-nushūr).”

chapter.eng-name: Something Else: The Supplication: “All Praise Is Due To Allah Who Revived My Soul”
